users.title: Beach
users.desc: Sunshine is the best medicine. An ocean breeze puts a mind at ease. We dream in colors borrowed from the sea. Leave footprints of love and kindness wherever you go. Sky above, sand below, peace within. Wherever you go, bring your own sunshine.

users.title: Urban
users.desc: Cities were always like people, showing their varying personalities to the traveler. Depending on the city and on the traveler, there might begin a mutual love, or dislike, friendship, or enmity.
